tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE movies (
  movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  release_year INT,
  director VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE movies (movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(100),
  release_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE tv_shows (show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(100),
  release_year INT);

CREATE TABLE actors (actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  birth_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE tv_shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE actors (
    actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    dob DATE,
    nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE movie_cast (
    movie_id INT,
    actor_id INT,
    role VARCHAR,
    PRIMARY KEY (movie_id, actor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movies(movie_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES actors(actor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE show_cast (
    show_id INT,
    actor_id INT,
    role VARCHAR,
    PRIMARY KEY (show_id, actor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES tv_shows(show_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES actors(actor_id)
);
